Floods can destroy your most treasured possessions.

Taking a few simple steps now can help protect your home and family.

Don‚Äôt lose what you love to a flood: https://t.co/xKGAQ9Oqsr

#PrepareActSurvive #FloodActionWeek https://t.co/AWlCNioPNv

@EnvAgency If councils stop building on flood plains it may help. If you live by a river you have got to accept you are going to be flooded out, you cannot beat the force of water no matter what precautions you take

tweets.text:
If you live in a flood risk area you should be prepared for #flooding.
This #FloodActionWeek we want to make you aware that you can:
- Sign up for flood warnings
- Make a simple flood plan 
- Know what to do in a flood
Find out how at: https://t.co/ZEHl74ryiJ
#PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/cJaWeSQXrV

Could you use less water? Erin's invention will help you do so daily - "It uses energy from humans...it also keeps you fit!" Erin is 10 from Northumberland. She took part in the Pioneers Energy Challenge & her work is on show now! Pls share and retweet! https://t.co/45cbTdPEsz https://t.co/6WuHTEr9W5

Erin age 10 from Northumberland's invention, Use Less Water not only encourages people to do that, it also gets people working together and doing more exercise! Check out her ingenious invention in the Pioneers Online Exhibition. Let's get peddling! üöøüîå‚ö°Ô∏è https://t.co/45cbTdPEsz https://t.co/8T94pVxVWj

Today we launched a ¬£200m programme to improve the resilience of communities at risk of #flooding & coastal change.

tweets.text: 5.2 million homes and businesses in England are at risk from flooding. While we work closely with @EnvAgency to create solutions which protect those homes it's important to know what to do in a flood #prepareactsurvive https://t.co/IXZgcekiiC https://t.co/vRf0Fw2IjC

The evidence is clear @GawRagbag. This is what's happened to my friends and visitors in just 50 years. Lot's of human talk, very little human action. As a river I am sick of it. @EnvAgency @NatResWales @CommonsEAC @WGEnviroAgri @Feargal_Sharkey @theriverstrust @AfonyddCymru https://t.co/xu0QNDg0oQ https://t.co/N2Oqy9Drkj
